item.title: April nor'easter is walloping New England with wind, rain and snow
item.description: New Englanders are expecting treacherous roads and power outages. Southern New England and the coastline will get mostly rain, and maybe a few inches of snow, with most snow further north.

item.title: The Aftermath of a Major Battle in Gaza
item.description:
Israel's military laid siege to Gaza's largest medical complex for two weeks because, they said, Hamas fighters had regrouped inside. Following the Israeli withdrawal from the hospital, Palestinians were able to get a glimpse of the results of the raid.

For more coverage of all sides of this conflict, go to npr.org/mideastupdates
